name: polynomial_smul_apply
initialProofState:
R : Type u_1
S : Type u_2
inst✝¹ : Semiring R
inst✝ : SMul R S
p : Polynomial R
f : R → S
x : R
⊢ Eq (HSMul.hSMul p f x) (HSMul.hSMul (Polynomial.eval x p) (f x))
decl:
@[simp]
theorem polynomial_smul_apply [Semiring R] [SMul R S] (p : R[X]) (f : R → S) (x : R) :
    (p • f) x = eval x p • f x :=
  rfl

name: polynomial_smul_apply'
initialProofState:
R : Type u_1
S : Type u_2
T : Type u_3
inst✝³ : CommSemiring R
inst✝² : Semiring S
inst✝¹ : Algebra R S
inst✝ : SMul S T
p : Polynomial R
f : S → T
x : S
⊢ Eq (HSMul.hSMul p f x) (HSMul.hSMul ((Polynomial.aeval x) p) (f x))
decl:
@[simp]
theorem polynomial_smul_apply' [CommSemiring R] [Semiring S] [Algebra R S] [SMul S T]
    (p : R[X]) (f : S → T) (x : S) : (p • f) x = aeval x p • f x :=
  rfl

name: Polynomial.algebraMap_pi_eq_aeval
initialProofState:
R : Type u_1
S : Type u_2
T : Type u_3
inst✝⁴ : CommSemiring R
inst✝³ : CommSemiring S
inst✝² : CommSemiring T
inst✝¹ : Algebra R S
inst✝ : Algebra S T
⊢ Eq ⇑(algebraMap (Polynomial R) (S → T)) fun p z => (algebraMap S T) ((Polynomial.aeval z) p)
decl:
@[simp]
theorem Polynomial.algebraMap_pi_eq_aeval :
    (algebraMap R[X] (S → T) : R[X] → S → T) = fun p z => algebraMap _ _ (aeval z p) :=
  rfl

name: Polynomial.algebraMap_pi_self_eq_eval
initialProofState:
R : Type u_1
inst✝ : CommSemiring R
⊢ Eq ⇑(algebraMap (Polynomial R) (R → R)) fun p z => Polynomial.eval z p
decl:
@[simp]
theorem Polynomial.algebraMap_pi_self_eq_eval :
    (algebraMap R[X] (R → R) : R[X] → R → R) = fun p z => eval z p :=
  rfl
